import axios from 'axios'; import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; export default function PatientListCard(props) { const history = useHistory() // const Temperature,TemperatureType,spO,bp,Pulse,Rbs,is_ins const [showVitalModal, setshowVitalModal] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { axios.defaults.headers.common[ "Authorization" ] = `Bearer ${localStorage.getItem("token")}`; },[]) const handleHistoryDirect = _ => { history.push("/patientHistory") } const handleVitalSubmit = _ => { const Params = { temperature:"50", temperature_type:0 } axios.post("https://myplusdoctor.med2myhome.com/api/user/storevital?patient_id=1",Params) .then(res=>{ console.log(res.data) }) } const handleGetPatinetVital = (id) => { axios .get( ` https://myplusdoctor.med2myhome.com/api/user/getpatientvitals?patient_id=${id}` ) .then((res) => { console.log(res.data); }); }; const handleStartConsult = _ => { history.push('/consult',{patient_id:props.patient_id}) } return ( <>
{props.first_name} {props.last_name}
{props.sex} | {props.blood_group}
{props.mobile_no}
Add Vitals
Temperature :
TemperatureType :
spO :
bp :
Pulse :
Rbs :
is_insulin :
insulin_quantity :
post_prandial :
fasting :
height :
weight :
) }
